attributes.action: Regenerate the Falkland Islands by building a Top Security Prison Facility
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The UK has an overcrowded prison population, and the falklands are overly dependent on tourism for its income. At the same time, Argentina still wants the Falkland Islands returned to it. The building of a top security prison facility, would add an income stream to the Islands, relieve pressure on our prison system and act as a deterrent to both re-offenders and the Government of Argentina.
